item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Shixiang Wang Add: 233, Haike Rd., Pudong District, Shanghai 201210, China Email: w_shixiang@163.com Personal website: https://shixiangwang.github.io Education 2016.09 ~ Present, Ph.D Student, Biology (focusing on cancer informatics), ShanghaiTech.
